thread.title: Solange Continues To Speak Out Against Beyoncé's Album Of The Year Loss!
thread.title_full: Solange Continues To Speak Out Against Beyoncé's Album Of The Year Loss!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Solange Continues To Speak Out Against Beyoncé's Album Of The Year Loss!
text:
Solange is standing up for her big sister...
As we reported , after Beyoncé 's Lemonade lost "Album Of The Year" to Adele 's 25 at the Grammys , the A Seat at the Table singer took to Twitter to voice her grievances about the snub.
Related: Solange Condemns Police Brutality 
In her tweet, the 30-year-old posted a link to Frank Ocean 's Tumblr post slamming the ceremony for giving the 2016 award to Taylor Swift 's 1989 over Kendrick Lamar 's To Pimp a Butterfly . 
However, Miz Knowles isn't finished voicing her opinion.
On Monday, in a now-deleted tweet, Solange brings up a starling fact regarding the prestigious music award show. She wrote: 
Do YOU think Beyoncé should've won over Adele?? SOUND OFF in the comments section (below)! 
[ Image via WENN . ]
